attributes.action: help female pensionners between the age of 60 and 65 already in receipt of state pension.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Abolition of 10% tax bracket particularly affects women between 60 and 65 who have retired and are in receipt of a state pension plus contributory pension. They are not eligble for the extra tax concession given to the over 65s. Their contributory pension will be reduced until they reach 65.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
